comments.content:
Since you raised a question about it, Chase, I wonder if any other LFE users have had a problem with disappearing typefaces? Every few weeks, some faces in my library just seem to vanish. Some faces seem more subject to disappearance than others, but I can’t ascribe the problem to a since face or family.

(Yes, I have the most recent version for Mac OS X.)

hi akma,

had the same thing some minutes ago (disappearing typefaces) -

it happened when adding typefaces per drag and drop to fontExplorer, since the typefaces are simply moved and not copied or relativly linked -

but you can always drag them back from fontExplorer into your own fonts folder and you’ll get a zip file there - did not yet find out to which exact location the files are moved..

..just a short reply -

best :)

I use the ‘manage by copying’ option (so, not ‘manage by moving’) and haven’t had such problems.  
[on OSX 10.4, that is] You can look for advice at the [Unofficial FEX Board](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015170950/http:/www.fontexplorerx-board.com/).
the problem I have under Leopard is that it deactivate the “some” fonts after restart....

It keeps saying that they took it down, It has said this same thing for two months now. hmmph
